Rule.Name: Ensure a dedicated replication-only user is created
Rule.NonCompliantComment: No dedicated replication-only user is created, which may lead to unauthorized replication access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Create a replication-only user for streaming replication. Command: CREATE ROLE replication_user WITH REPLICATION LOGIN PASSWORD 'secure_password';

Rule.Name: Ensure logging of replication commands is enabled
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Logging of replication commands is not configured, which may prevent monitoring of replication activities.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure logging of replication commands is enabled in postgresql.conf.

Rule.Name: Ensure base backups are configured and functional
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Base backups are not configured, which may lead to incomplete disaster recovery.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure base backups are configured and functional. Command: 1. Use the pg_basebackup tool to create backups. 2. Example: pg_basebackup -D /var/lib/pgsql/17/backups -F t -z -X fetch -P

Rule.Name: Ensure WAL archiving is configured and functional
Rule.NonCompliantComment: WAL (Write-Ahead Logging) archiving is not configured, which may prevent recovery of committed transactions.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure WAL archiving is enabled and archive_command is properly set.
Rule.Correction: sed -i '/archive_mode/s/#//;s/=.*/= on/' /var/lib/pgsql/17/data/postgresql.conf; sed -i '/archive_command/s/#//;s/=.*/= 'cp %p /var/lib/pgsql/17/wal_archive/%f'/' /var/lib/pgsql/17/data/postgresql.conf; systemctl restart postgresql-17

Rule.Name: Ensure streaming replication parameters are configured correctly
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Streaming replication parameters are not configured correctly, which may result in unstable replication.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure streaming replication parameters are correctly configured. Command: 1. Edit the postgresql.conf file. 2. Set the following: wal_level = replica max_wal_senders = 5 max_replication_slots = 5 3. Restart PostgreSQL using systemctl restart postgresql-17.
